response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only boasts a remarkable value of $12,000 to me but also comes with a unique set of features tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product at an exclusive price of $11,000. I believe this offer presents a great value for you while ensuring a generous return for us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
